item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. An introduction to Magit, an Emacs mode for Git (49 points | 20 comments)
2. A look at Firefox forks (35 points | 16 comments)
3. Why I Don't Like Hackathons (3 points | 2 comments)

6. Matching Regexps 200 Times Faster (7 points | no comments)
7. Popular GitHub Action tj-actions/changed-files is compromised (4 points | 2 comments)
8. Can we communally deprecate git checkout? (62 points | 93 comments)
9. did u ever read so hard u accidentally wrote? (17 points | 2 comments)
10. i-cant-believe-its-not-webusb: Hacking around lack of WebUSB support in Firefox (26 points | 5 comments)
11. SICL: Fresh Implementation of Common Lisp (5 points | 1 comment)
12. Shellcode Encoded in UUIDs (8 points | no comments)
13. PAM unixsock (14 points | 3 comments)
14. The Pi-Search Page (3 points | 2 comments)
15. How to beat NES mario in 0.000005 seconds (4 points | 2 comments)
16. My Scammer Girlfriend: Baiting A Romance Fraudster (12 points | 1 comment)
17. Disclosing YouTube Creator Emails for a $20k Bounty (4 points | no comments)
18. ruby_llm, a delightful Ruby way to work with AI (2 points | no comments)

20. Enhancing CA Practices: Key Updates in Mozilla Root Store Policy, v3.0 (11 points | 4 comments)
21. coq-of-rust: Formal verification tool for Rust (12 points | 5 comments)
22. Recursion kills: The story behind CVE-2024-8176 / Expat 2.7.0 released, includes security fixes (20 points | 2 comments)
23. Kerning, the Hard Way (5 points | no comments)
24. What are you doing this weekend? (7 points | 23 comments)
25. What Programming Concepts do you Struggle to Grok or Use in Production? (23 points | 51 comments)
